premise_source_doc_sentence: John Stephen Goodman  (  born June 20 , 1952  )  is an American actor .

claim: Transformers: The Last Knight only stars John Goodman.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Early in his career , he was best known for playing Dan Conner on the ABC TV series Roseanne  (  1988 -- 1997  )  , for which he won a Golden Globe Award for Best Actor in 1993 .

claim: Transformers: The Last Knight only stars John Goodman.

claim: Transformers: The Last Knight only stars John Goodman.
